lead_paragraph: Arkansas State Coach Steve Roberts said the Big 12’s coordinator of officials has acknowledged that the Indians’ recovery of an onside kick was wrongly overturned in the final minute of a 21-13 loss to No. 7 Texas on Saturday. The Indians were flagged for an improper formation, and Texas recovered the second onside kick and ran out the clock.
